name: HUE
comment:
Hue is a graphical user interface to operate and develop
      applications for Apache Hadoop.

properties.name: database_logging
properties.description:
To show database transactions, set database_logging to 1.
      default, database_logging=0

properties.name: http_host
properties.description: Webserver listens on this address and port

properties.name: http_port
properties.description: Webserver listens on this address and port

properties.name: time_zone
properties.description: Time zone name

properties.name: django_debug_mode
properties.description: Turn off debug

properties.name: use_cherrypy_server
properties.description:
Set to true to use CherryPy as the webserver, set to false
      to use Spawning as the webserver. Defaults to Spawning if
      key is not specified.

properties.name: http_500_debug_mode
properties.description: Turn off backtrace for server error

properties.name: backend_auth_policy
properties.description: Authentication backend.

properties.name: db_engine
properties.description: Configuration options for specifying the Desktop Database.

properties.description: Configuration options for specifying the Desktop Database.

properties.name: db_port
properties.description: Configuration options for specifying the Desktop Database.

properties.name: db_user
properties.description: Configuration options for specifying the Desktop Database.

properties.name: db_password
properties.description: Configuration options for specifying the Desktop Database.

properties.name: db_name
properties.description: Configuration options for specifying the Desktop Database.

properties.name: smtp_host
properties.description: The SMTP server information for email notification delivery.

properties.name: smtp_port
properties.description: The SMTP server information for email notification delivery.

properties.name: smtp_password
properties.description: The SMTP server information for email notification delivery.

properties.name: tls
properties.description: Whether to use a TLS (secure) connection when talking to the SMTP server.

properties.name: default_from_email
properties.description: The SMTP server information for email notification delivery.

properties.name: jobtracker_port
properties.description: The port where the JobTracker IPC listens on.

properties.name: hadoop_mapred_home
properties.description: The SMTP server information for email notification delivery.

properties.name: hbase_nice_name
properties.description: Define and configure a new shell type hbase

properties.name: hbase_shell_command
properties.description: Define and configure a new shell type hbase.

Define and configure a new shell type bash for testing only
